answerText: São Salvador de Bahia[10] This city in the same country as Salvador contains the gigantic Maracanã Stadium and Mount Corcovado.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Harvard  | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This city lies at the tip of a peninsula separating the Atlantic Ocean from Todos os Santos Bay, the namesake of the state of which it is the capital. For 10 points each: [10] Name this city where Muslim slaves called Malês revolted in 1835, the capital of Bahia.
